name: Trigger Teddies go on vacations (DD Gamejam)
name_original: Trigger Teddies go on vacations (DD Gamejam)
description:
Dark Deception is a property of Glowstick Entertainment. It is a fan creation for the official DD Gamejam

Mama Bear seems to be busy with something during vacations, so you must take care of her trigger teddies  like a responsible parent figure would.
